scriptmanager.charts

Class HeatMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.charts.HeatMap

  • public class HeatMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of static methods for formatting and plotting data into heatmaps of matrix values
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    BAMGenomeCorrelation

    • Method Detail

      • getPresetPaintscale

        public static org.jfree.chart.renderer.LookupPaintScale getPresetPaintscale(short type)
        Get paint scale based on scale encoding value.
        Parameters:
        type - scale encoding for one of the preset paint scales (e.g. REDWHITEBLUE, JETLIKE).
        Returns:
        paintscale for the given encoding

      • createCorrelationHeatmap

        public static org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel createCorrelationHeatmap(java.lang.String[] labels,
                                                                  double[][] MATRIX,
                                                                  java.io.File output,
                                                                  org.jfree.chart.renderer.LookupPaintScale paintScale)
        Create a correlation heatmap plot based on a square matrix of inputs with a strict percentile-based blue-to-red paint scale (9 levels).
        Parameters:
        labels - (sample names) for labeling the y-axis (symmetrical plot so x-axis labels are implied)
        MATRIX - the symmetrical 2D array of values
        output - the file to write the PNG chart to. File not written if this value is null.
        Returns:
        the resulting correlation heatmap chart
